body.name: Montana West Washed Leather Hobo Bags for Women Roomy Handbags with Crossbody Strap
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 5 hrs 53 mins
features: FEATURE: Buttery soft crossbody bag, smooth and easy to clean.
MATERIAL: Premium PU leather after stone washed processing, long lasting and durable.
SIZE: 15.5"(L)x 4.5"(W)x 13"(H)；handle drop:7". Including a detachable crossbody strap.
STRUCTURE: A zipper pocket on both front and back of the handbag. Internal including two zippered pockets and two open pockets.
AFTER SALES SERVICE: 90 days return and exchange service. 100% satisfaction guarantee.
body.description: Montana West is a collection that combines the best of traditional western elements with our unique modern design. The Montana West brand has about 30 years histories in America, providing a variety of high-quality ladies handbags and other peripheral products, with good quality assurance. If you have any questions or problems about the product, please feel free to contact us, we will try our best to provide you good customer service. Three styles are available: ❤①: Studded concealed carry purses with adjustable crossbody strap; ❤②: Soft washed leather hobo bags with detachable crossbody strap; ❤③: Washed leather shoulder handbags with Retro Metal Buckle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Montana West Washed Leather Crossbody Bags Get ready to revolutionize your style game! Crafted with the magic of washed leather, this bag laughs in the face of color fading, peeling, cracking, and even moisture – no weather tantrums can ruin your vibe with this beauty by your side. It's not just a purse; it's your stability rock, with enough thickness to confidently perch wherever you place it, all while flaunting your vibrant personality. This bag doesn't just carry essentials; it carries confidence and a splash of spontaneity for the spirited woman on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Purse! Not Genuine Leather (PU)
reviews.reviewText: The purse is beautiful and a fairly decent price while on sale. I love all the pockets and zippers. It feels high quality. The lining feels nice and thick and the exterior is soft and pleasant to touch. I was looking for a leather purse and the price of this one was really low for leather. There has been some debate about the purse being real leather. I figured I would take a chance and order it. Ultimately the purse was NOT leather. The tag actually says it is polyurethane. I left a photo of the bag and the tag along with it just for proof since everyone seems to be debating about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bag is great so far. The color is really nice and the leather is very soft. I love all the pockets, room for everything. It's easy to carry. It remains to be seen how it holds up as I just received it a couple of days ago. So far I am pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love all the pockets
reviews.reviewText: I have only used my purse for about four days, but looks like it will be as good as most of my purses. Sturdiness and durability are difficult to rate in four days. I really like all the pockets. It would have been nice to have one on the outside end of the purse to hold water bottles.I have a complaint about ordering on your website. Several colors of this purse were on sale. A bright green one was included in that. I wanted that purse. But every time I entered it in green, it priced that one at full price, which was ten dollars more. So I chose another color. Oh, that green was beautiful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like this purse (even though I’m not a conceal and carry person)!
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 of these purses. One in grey I’ve had for a year and recently the same in purple. The purses are soft, well-made and attractive with lots of pockets. Like one of the raters previously noted, the description says it’s made of “washed leather” and it appears to be leather, however the tag on the newest one says the outer part is PU, not leather. I’ve had no trouble with the first purse freezing hard during very cold days (Minnesota). Hopefully the new one won’t either. The “Montana West” has changed from a small discrete metal logo on the back last years model to a now larger plastic (cheap-looking) logo which I hope doesn’t catch on things. As I said, I really do love this soft less structured purse!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the room this purse has. There are so many pockets along with two large zippered spaces that can hold just about everything you want to put in it. The leather is so soft, with a great design. I love the color I chose as I wear a lot of denim so this will go with my casual style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got a new gun for xmas and it fits nicely in this purse. Got the black one and it has plenty room for everything else if you aren't carrying. Soft leather, zippers are sturdy and fits easily on my shoulder. Would absolutely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's very roomy but doesn't offer a lot in the way pockets and compartments. The leather is super soft and feels amazing. The lining, however, is super thin and loose fitting and definitely won't stand up to keys, pens, or anything even remotely sharp. Also, unlike other Montana West bags, there is no dedicated concealed carry pocket on this bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made very well
reviews.reviewText: Sooo super soft, roomy, made well. I pack my purse all the time, the straps are very sturdy, love this purse, wish it had more pockets, but i absolutely am satisfied.
Fue un regalo, me comenta que le encanto, de buena calidad, llego a tiempo y bien.
